messages.title: We need a real change:
messages.content: From austerity and welfare cuts to investment in decent jobs and services. From privatisation for the benefit of the wealthy to public management of essential services, not driven by corporate greed. From subsidies to fracking and dependence on fossil fuels to a sustainable world we can pass on to our children.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investment in decent jobs and services, away from austerity and welfare cuts.
Opposing subsidies to fracking and fostering a sustainable world.
Against privatisation, for public management of essential services.
Bring the minimum wage up to the Living wage level and raise this to at least £10/hr by 2020.
Nationalisation of rail and energy sectors.
Regulate banks, shifting focus from corporate greed to public interest.
Implementing a wealth tax on the top 1%.
Transition to fully renewable energy sources.
Adoption of anti-NATO and anti-Trident stance.
Conducting a referendum on EU membership and pushing for significant reforms.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Islington is one of the most pro-EU and pro-migration areas in the country.

issues.brexitEurope: Islington is one of the most pro-EU and pro-migration areas in the country. Make it possible for the public to recall inadequate MPs and have a referendum on EU membership - through 'we believe' it's in the country's best interests to argue for significant reforms and stay in.
issues.economy: From austerity and welfare cuts to investment in decent jobs and services.
issues.environment: From subsidies to fracking and dependence on fossil fuels to a sustainable world we can pass on. 100% RENEWABLE ENERGY
issues.governance: From privatisation for the benefit of the wealthy to public management of essential services, not driven by corporate greed.
issues.immigration: Islington is one of the most pro-EU and pro-migration areas in the country. Migrants make an important contribution to Islington. Migrants make an important contribution to our economy, our society, our culture and our borough.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Islington is one of the most pro-EU and pro-migration areas in the country.
